text: My girl has been learning swimming from Coach Xavier for the past 1 year since she was four. Coach Xavier is very patient with young children and prioritizes in teaching the proper swimming strokes. Despite the challenges of facing the frequent changing rules and regulations due to COVID-19, Coach Xavier has minimize the learning impact to the children by executing flexibility; such as duration of the swimming lessons / number of students per lesson etc. Coach Xavier has communicated well with parents and accommodate well to the rules.
Been with Coach Xavier for almost 2 years. He is very patient with kids and the kids trust him. Highly recommend him as a swim coach.
Coach Xavier is very patience and he teaches the kids the right posture. He is very on time too. I will strongly recommend him to my friends.

My gal enjoy his class and keeps update about current about the rules and regulations during this stabling period.Offer 1 to 1 classes without any additional charges although short time but at least my gal can enjoy herself in the pool.
My son always like to tease and play with him as he is a caring and friendly coach. Very patience with kid and my boy enjoy his swimming class so much!
